aboutMe.heading: About Me
aboutMe.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in React, Next.js, and modern web technologies. With a keen eye for design and a love for clean code, I create digital experiences that are both beautiful and functional.

projects.heading: My Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. Each represents a unique challenge and learning experience.

projectOne.title: Portfolio Website
projectOne.description: A responsive portfolio website built with Next.js, featuring GSAP animations and multi-language support.

projectTwo.title: E-commerce Platform
projectTwo.description: A full-featured online store with user authentication, product management, and payment processing.

projectThree.title: Mobile App
projectThree.description: A cross-platform mobile application built with React Native for both iOS and Android devices.

work.heading: Work Experience
work.description: My professional journey in the world of web development.

companyOne.name: Tech Innovations Inc.
companyOne.description: Leading the front-end development team in creating innovative web applications.

achievements.one: Implemented a new component library that reduced development time by 30%
achievements.two: Optimized site performance, improving load times by 40%
achievements.three: Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews

companyTwo.name: Digital Solutions Ltd.
companyTwo.description: Worked on various web projects using React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

achievements.one: Developed a customer portal that improved client satisfaction by 25%
achievements.two: Implemented CI/CD pipelines that streamlined deployment processes
achievements.three: Contributed to open-source projects and shared knowledge through tech talks

companyThree.name: Creative Web Agency
companyThree.description: Started my career working on websites for small businesses and startups.

achievements.one: Built responsive websites for over 15 clients
achievements.two: Learned and implemented modern JavaScript frameworks
achievements.three: Collaborated with designers to create cohesive user experiences

contactMe.heading: Get In Touch
contactMe.description: Have a project in mind or want to chat? Feel free to reach out!
contactMe.formMessagePlaceholder: Tell me about your project or inquiry

contactMe.errorMessage: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.

footer.tagline: Building the web, one pixel at a time
